roleset.name: eat snack
roleset.note: SNACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'snack' based on sentences in ectb2, by Jena. Verbnet entry dine-39.5, comparison with 'eat'. (from snack.01-v)

example.text: They-1 could also opt *-1 to snack on steamed buns or stuffed dumplings.
example.arg: on steamed buns or stuffed dumplings

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His snacking on multiple bags of popcorn every day left him extremely sick and short of breath, his lungs deteriorated by bronchiolitis obliterans, a potentially fatal lung disease.
